Title: [ANN] DAO PlayMarket 2.0 - App Store based on the blockchain and smart contracts
Body: ADVANTAGES FOR OWNERS OF NODES DAO PlayMarket 2.0  For stable operation of the platform, it is necessary to have a certain number of nodes in the network (10 nodes are currently operating, nodes in different countries of the World, a link to a map with nodes — https://playmarket.io/map ), that provide reception and transmission, recording transactions in the blockchain, and storing all application files. The owners of the nodes as a motivation receive a reward in the form of 1% of the processed transactions. This and all Commission platform!  The more users the DAO PlayMarket.io 2.0 platform has, the more nodes will be needed. To add your node to the list of trusted ( https://nodes.playmarket.io ), its owner must make a guarantee deposit, in the base currency of the platform — 10 ETH and 5000 PMT tokens for a smart contract. A deposit is required as a pledge and a guarantee of good work of the node, while its size is calculated dynamically depending on the payment turnover passing through it. More in white paper — https://ico.playmarket.io/images/docs/wp_playmarket_en.pdf and forum https://bitcoingarden.org/forum/index.php?topic=74911  What is a DAO PlayMarket 2.0 node?  The node provides an API (application programming interface) for running mobile apps and/or platform sites. Each node has a full node of Ethereum blockchain. When the node is running, the information from smart contracts is constantly synchronized with a NoSQL DBMS (MongoDB).  This is necessary to speed up the performance of the node whose API is implemented on Node.js. Node.js allows you to create cross-platform, high-end services. The task of the node at the initial stage is to get information about frequently used apps from the file storage and cache them.  Upon request, it transfers them to the mobile app, loads and caches information about new applications. His opinion about DAO PlayMarket2.0: "I have been engaged in cryptocurrency mining since 2013, and the PlayMarket 2.0 project interested me first of all with its unusual mining mechanism. In fact, this is not a traditional way, it is more like the cooperation of users. At the moment, Google Play earns almost 30% of the total income from the sale of applications and then spends it at its discretion. PlayMarket 2.0 offers to divide the income received among the cooperating members: the commission for the developer is significantly reduced; the owners of the nodes that help the network work receive a reward in the form of a percentage of the turnover. All these advantages show that working with the PlayMarket 2.0 project can be more profitable than cryptocurrency mining." More info on the web-site: https://ico.playmarket.io/

Author: GES
Title: [ANN] DAO PlayMarket 2.0 - App Store based on the blockchain and smart contracts
Body: PlayMarket 2.0: The Next-Gen Way App-Development Platform     After an initial ICO, starting this November 8, PlayMarket will begin marketing to both developers and consumers. The developers can use the platform to raise funds to create their apps and get marketing support. Users can find apps that they think have promise and invest in their development, gaining benefits of dividends from future profits earned by the app, in game, purchases, etc.  PlayMarket will then be a decentralized organization. Developers and users will find each other through the platform. Useful apps will be supported and promoted by the wisdom of the crowds. The PlayMarket tokens, will be useful not only in the PlayMarket ecosystem, but also tradeable on any cryptocurrency exchange that lists it.  And what of Google or Apple in this scenario? Why, they simply won’t have a role. Nor will they be able to skim the 30 or more percent fees off the top of every purchase that should go directly to the developer. And get more people interested in developing apps and figuring out new and cool ways to make our online lives more fun, interesting, and convenient. Source

Body: PlayMarket 2.0 in Full Swing with $350 Thousand Closed from Funding Round   With the recent trend of Android instant apps getting leaner and faster, more users are relying more in mobile technology in order to navigate everyday activities. Google has even updated its instant app programming so that the app only loads the data it needs to run on a specific device. And with the crypto ecosystem booming with the recent spike on the Bitcoin price, crypto apps are dominating the scene. Enter PlayMarket 2.0, a decentralized Android app store, combined with an ICO developer platform, crypto exchange, that accepts payment in cryptocurrency.  Most recently, as part of PlayMarket 2.0’s preparation, it held a closed round of financing, where the largest companies were present. This series of funding round accumulated over $350 thousand from partner companies like Cyber Russia and BitBaza. All the funds raised will go to further development of the PlayMarket2.0 platform, namely, the implementation of a marketing program to promote the platform.★ Source ★

Author: HAPtheLogic
Title: [ANN] DAO PlayMarket 2.0 - App Store based on the blockchain and smart contracts
Body: PlayMarket 2.0 ICO 8 Kasım’da Başlıyor  Dürüstlük, şeffaflık ve elverişliliği anahtar kelimeleri olarak belirlemiş PlayMarket smart contracts temelli olup, mobil uygulamalar için geliştirilmiş yeni nesil, sansürsüz bir platformdur. Cyber Russia ve Bitbaza şirketlerinden 350 bin dolar yatırım alan şirket ekibi ekibi, platformu geliştirmek ve çeşitlendirmek için ICO kampanyası düzenliyor. PlayMarket 2.0 platformunun temel amacı geliştiriciler, yatırımcılar ve kullanıcılar için sürdürülebilir bir ekonomik model yaratmak ve mobil aplikasyonlar marketini tokenize etmek için bir standart geliştirmektir.  PMT token’lerinin sahipleri aynı zamanda PlayMarket Fonuna (PMF) da dahildir. Platform üzerinden ICO’sunu yürüten mobil aplikasyonların basılan token’lerinin % 5’i fona aktarılır. Yatırımcılar token’leriyle PlayMarket borsasında (PEX) işlem yapabilir veya token’lerini tutarak şirketin kârından pay alabilir. Token’lerle bunun yanı sıra diğer borsalarda işlem yapılabilir. PMT token’inin ICO’nun ardından diğer borsalarda listelenerek pazarını genişleteceğini söyleyebiliriz.  Proje danışmanları  22 kişilik geniş proje ekibine 4 sükseli danışman eşlik ediyor. Bu isimler arasında en dikkat çekeni şüphesiz kripto para yatırımcısı Chandler Guo. Platformun potansiyelinin oldukça büyük olduğunu kaydeden Guo, uzun zamandır kripto para dünyasında olduğunu ve tecrübelerini bunun gibi projelerin yararına kullanmak istediğini ifade ediyor.★ Source ★   DAO PlayMarket 2.0
